gov.va.med.srcalc.security

Class SecurityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.security.SecurityUtil

  • public final class SecurityUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Authentication- and authorization-related utility methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VistaUserDetails getCurrentPrincipal()
      Returns the currently-authenticated security principal (in other words, the current user).

      • getCurrentPrincipal

        public static VistaUserDetails getCurrentPrincipal()
        Returns the currently-authenticated security principal (in other words, the current user).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no currently-authenticated principal
